pageContext.title: Gwendolyn Brooks Poetry Slam
pageContext.description_excerpt: On April 24, 2004, the University of Maryland held its annual open house for the state's citizens, Maryland Day, and the David C. Driskell Center and MITH co-produced the Gwendolyn Brooks Poetry Slam, an event designed to bring high school students, university students, and university faculty together to celebrate African-American literary heritage. \r\n
